options.command: if [ -x .venv/bin/python ]; then .venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8100; else python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8100; fi

dev.command: if [ -x .venv/bin/python ]; then .venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8100; else python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8100; fi

prod.command: if [ -x .venv/bin/python ]; then .venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8100; else python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8100; fi
